thread.title: Waterloo ex-judge gets jail in phony toilet tank attack
thread.title_full: Waterloo ex-judge gets jail in phony toilet tank attack

author: democratandchronicle.com
title: Waterloo ex-judge gets jail in phony toilet tank attack
text:
A former Seneca County village judge was sentenced to six months in jail and five years of probation Tuesday on charges relating to lying that two men attacked him with a toilet tank lid outside his Waterloo courthouse in 2013. Roger Barto, 54, was convicted in August on felony charges of insurance fraud, falsifying business records and defrauding the government, and a misdemeanor charge of falsely reporting an incident.
Barto told police that he was attacked while locking up Waterloo Village Court on Aug. 31, 2013. He claimed he was choked and hit over the head with a toilet tank lid.
A photo of Barto on the evening of the alleged attack shows him lying on the ground outside the courthouse door surrounded by shards of a white porcelain.
ROCHESTER DEMOCRAT AND CHRONICLE
Waterloo justice convicted of lying about attack
Former judge Roger Barto lies on the ground outside Waterloo Village Court in August 2013 after claiming he was hit in the head with a toilet tank lid. (Photo: Seneca County District Attorney's Office)
Medical evidence presented at trial showed no sign of physical injury. Barto was hospitalized for nine days, but evidence showed he was treated for gout, chronic back pain, high blood pressure and constipation.
Seneca County District Attorney Barry Porsch alleged Barto concocted the whole story to access prescription painkillers. The county paid $41,500 for his medical care.
Barto reimbursed the full amount on Tuesday prior to his sentencing, according to the District Attorney's Office.
A trial date has yet to be set on two other counts Barto faces for allegedly stealing gasoline from the village in April 2014 in his role as sexton of the village cemetery.
DANDREATTA@Gannett.com
ROCHESTER DEMOCRAT AND CHRONICLE
Andreatta: Village judges shouldn't be village idiots
